Articles.Content:
Does anybody remember the days when we had to use winglets for landing legs? And we didn't have small engines or small tanks?

If you miss those days and want to try something similar in .17, this is for you! This is the Demo Mun Rocket and it's built in a

similar fashion to the old rockets that us pre-paid version players used.

The launch vehicle and all stages:

http://i.imgur.com/pnD3x.jpg

The lander sitting on the surface of the Mun:

http://i.imgur.com/dBWlF.png

DOWNLOAD

https://dl.dropbox.com/u/76061308/Demo%20Rocket.zip

Remember to eject your landing gear as you ascend towards Munar Orbit to save weight. And all you noobs, you can see what

life was like for people when this is what Mun landings required. lol.

Ah, I remember these good old days...

Not that today isn't better of course.

Yeah, actually in 0.14 I still used winglets, cause the legs were worthless back then. Then came 0.16, that changed the way we land!

Edited October 7, 2012 by AlexanderTheKerbanaut
Too bad I couldn't use the old Mk1 Pod for this, too.
